import { useCallback, useState } from "react"; import VocabularyItem from "./VocabularyItem"; import {v4} from 'uuid' //get method v4 from uuid function VocabularyPage({course, addVocabulary}) { const [textInput1,setTextInput1] = useState("") const [textInput2,setTextInput2] = useState("") const [type,setType] = useState("None") const [vocabularyList, setVocabularyList] = useState(course.vocabularyList) const onTextInputChange1 = useCallback((e) => { setTextInput1(e.target.value) },[]) const onTextInputChange2 = useCallback((e) => { setTextInput2(e.target.value) },[]) const onTypeChange = useCallback((e) => { setType(e.target.value) },[]) // const createVocabulary = useCallback((id,textInput1,textInput2,type,setTextInput1,setTextInput2,setType) => { // const vocab = {id: v4(),tuvung:textInput1,loaitu:type,nghiacuatu:textInput2,isHidden:false} // setVocabularyList([...vocabularyList,vocab]) // setTextInput1("") // setTextInput2("") // setType("") // },[vocabularyList]) const clickAddVocabulary = useCallback((e) => { setVocabularyList([...vocabularyList,{id: v4(),tuvung:textInput1,loaitu:type,nghiacuatu:textInput2,isHidden:false}]) const vocabularyL = vocabularyList setTextInput1("") setTextInput2("") setType("None") addVocabulary(course.id,vocabularyL) },[vocabularyList,textInput1,type,textInput2]) return ( <>
